select t.*,IF(t.USE_MONTH=9999,CONCAT('单笔满',t.MONEY*100,'的定期宝可用'),IF(t.USE_MONTH=12,CONCAT('单笔满',t.MONEY*100,'的12月宝可用'),CONCAT('单笔满',t.MONEY*100,'的',t.USE_MONTH,'月及以上期限可用'))) as openCondition from (SELECT a.*,USE_MONTH FROM t_red_envelop_account a join t_red_rule r on a.RED_TYPE=r.RED_TYPE and a.MONEY=r.RED_MONEY WHERE (a.STATUS = 1 OR a.STATUS = 2) AND a.user_id =#{userId} order by r.USE_MONTH+0 ) t group by t.id order by t.add_time desc;
